content:
Stocking up on laundry detergent is a great idea, especially when you have coupons to sweeten the deal!

As for digital coupons, I've checked the Cartwheel app and Target's website, and here are some current offers:

* **Tide:**
	+ 5% off Tide Laundry Detergent ( Cartwheel offer, expires 3/12)
	+ $1 off Tide Pods (digital coupon, expires 3/14)
* **Gain:**
	+ 5% off Gain Laundry Detergent (Cartwheel offer, expires 3/12)
* **Arm & Hammer:**
	+ 5% off Arm & Hammer Laundry Detergent (Cartwheel offer, expires 3/12)

Please note that digital coupons and Cartwheel offers are subject to change and may expire soon. I recommend checking the Cartwheel app or Target's website for the most up-to-date offers before your shopping trip.

You can also check the Target website for any additional digital coupons or manufacturer coupons that might be available. Sometimes, they offer exclusive coupons for online shoppers or loyalty program members.

Remember to stack your digital coupons with your $1 off Tide coupons and the sales prices I mentioned earlier to maximize your savings!

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
